article_title: Kasich looks to Michigan for momentum
article_text:

article_metadata.description: After departing New Hampshire with a much-needed second place finish last week, Ohio Gov. John Kasich (R) is now banking on an equally strong turnout in Michigan.

og.description: After departing New Hampshire with a much-needed second place finish last week, Ohio Gov. John Kasich (R) is now banking on an equally strong turnout in Michigan.
